title: The capabilities of mdx
author: Liron kaner
body:

",e(t.a,{href:"https://github.com/shikijs/shiki",children:e(t.code,{children:"shiki"})})," syntax highlighter that provides beautiful code blocks for Markdown or MDX. It works on both the server at build-time (avoiding runtime syntax highlighting) and on the client for dynamic highlighting."]}),"

",e(t.p,{children:"Draw attention to a particular line of code."}),"
